name: 搜索·迷城掠影/The phantom of the city
name_original: 搜索·迷城掠影/The phantom of the city
description:
April 3, 1998 Night
I remember that it was raining that day.
I don't have an umbrella
Walk into the police building
Drenched
Oncoming a man of 30 years old
Faceless, very serious
This is my first impression of Mr Old A.

"搜索·迷城掠影/The phantom of the city"is a full motion video exploration narrative game.Game will bring the player into someone's memory link, find the correct memory fragment by prompting, and piece together the story and truth behind the memory.Unknown secrets wait for your exploration, maybe everyone will have their own answer!

· The game is all built from real motion video
· Some images look fuzzy a bit, and sometimes people's memory seems like this too
· You will observe those familiar spaces in the city from a new perspective
· Don't ignore any information details, including images, text, sounds, etc.
· Find the correct link information in the memory image by prompting
· Link information is the "key" to enter the next piece of memory fragment
· Each level tries to tell a small story about the protagonist
· The images appear in the game may come from cities you are familiar with or want to go

"We will continue to add some new memory video to make the story more complete and rich!You will believe that everything is just the beginning!"
